channel.title: A selection of objective ideas for Neutral Classes
channel.description:
I might make classes of these, I might not Feel free to use them
1. See the downfall of a certain faction 2. Predict X amount of deaths 3. Get X Player killed by Y method 4. Get a role and fulfill it's objective 5. Something to do with visits 6. Successfully perform a certain amount of abilities
Will add more later
